str2: In like manner, likewise, just so. From hos and an adverb from autos; as thus, i.e. In the same way.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
To dine, sup, eat. From deipnon; to dine, i.e. Take the principle meal.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A drinking cup, the contents of the cup; fig: the portion which God allots.

str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
A drinking cup, the contents of the cup; fig: the portion which God allots.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Fresh, new, unused, novel. Of uncertain affinity; new
From diatithemai; properly, a disposition, i.e. a contract.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: Or ekchuno ek-khoo'-no from ek and cheo; to pour forth; figuratively, to bestow.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
